SOMB.F.summary: Stockmann Oyj Abp engages in retailing business in Finland and internationally. It operates through Lindex and Stockmann segments. The Lindex segment offers women's wear, lingerie, children's wear, and cosmetics through the Lindex fashion chain. It operates 458 stores in 18 countries, as well as Lindex.com, an online store. The Stockmann segment operates department stores; and stockmann.com, an online store. It operates eight department stores, which offer fashion, cosmetics, and home products. Stockmann Oyj Abp was founded in 1862 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.
